== Njarackal (CT) (627998) ==

Njarackal (CT) is a town in the [[Kochi]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 8.63 sq. km. and harbouring 5848 households with total population of 23760 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 240 km. Male population is 11544 and female population is 12216. Scheduled Caste population is 3514 and Scheduled Tribes population is 44. Census Location Code of the town is 627998<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 12 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 12 km. Railway station is at Ernakulam at a distance of 12 km.
